name: Blight Relic
explicitMods: 4% chance to receive additional Divination Card items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
1% chance to receive additional Harbinger items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
25% chance in Heists for Chromatic Orbs to drop as Orbs of Fusing instead
4% chance in Heists for Regal Orbs to drop as Exalted Orbs instead
descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this
